wf_workflow_version.name: Section II
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_activity.name: Alert Finance to Modified Section II

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear Finance,
HR has modified ${sys_created_by} 's training reimbursement form for secondary reimbursement (section 2) and needs your approval. The id is: ${number} and will appear in your tasks momentarily.
IT
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear Finance,
HR has modified ${sys_created_by} 's training reimbursement form for secondary reimbursement (section 2) and needs your approval. The id is: ${number} and will appear in your tasks momentarily.
IT
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Alert Finance to Modified Section II

wf_activity.name: Alert HR to Rejected Section II

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear HR,
Finance has rejected ${sys_created_by} 's training reimbursement form for secondary reimbursement (section 2). The id is: ${number} and will appear in your tasks momentarily. Please go back and make the appropriate modifications or reject it if necessary.
IT
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear HR,
Finance has rejected ${sys_created_by} 's training reimbursement form for secondary reimbursement (section 2). The id is: ${number} and will appear in your tasks momentarily. Please go back and make the appropriate modifications or reject it if necessary.
IT
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Alert HR to Rejected Section II

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

Dear ${sys_created_by},
The second section of the training reimbursement form you submitted has been approved. Go to the original record to view more information about it. Your contract code is ${u_section_1_contract_code_string} and your labor category is ${u_section_1_labor_category_string}.
IT

Dear ${sys_created_by},
The second section of the training reimbursement form you submitted has been approved. Go to the original record to view more information about it. Your contract code is ${u_section_1_contract_code_string} and your labor category is ${u_section_1_labor_category_string}.
IT

Dear ${sys_created_by},
Your reimbursement form has been rejected. Please go to your original record for more details.
IT

Your reimbursement form has been rejected. Please go to your original record for more details.
IT
